ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Development_Start_Date__c)), OR( NOT(Requirement_Gathering_Competed__c), NOT(Understanding_completed__c) ) ),
AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Development_Start_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Development_Start_Date__c))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Development Start Date can only be set after completing Requirement Gathering and Understanding. Once set, IT CANNOT BE CHANGED
